fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Taxation, Single market, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: PSD2, Interchange Regulation, SEPA Regulation, NIS Directive, AML, GDPR, Cloud Services, Brexit
organisation_name: European Association of Payment Service Providers for Merchants (EPSM)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The "European Association of Payment Service Providers for Merchants" (EPSM) is an interest representation and information platform of more than 60 European organisations. Voting members are payment network operators, acquirers and other payment service providers for merchants. Among the non-voting members are terminal manufacturers, processing providers and payment schemes.
